about_the_game:
PLOT! is the solo developed, action precision platformer that has it all:
  • Frustrating Jumps
  • Annoying Traps
  • Pesky Enemies
  • Hard Earned Collectables
All rendered in glorious, buttery smooth 3D!


You have 90 seconds to:
  • Find The Key
  • Then find The Lock
  • Finally, find The Door - which leads out of one level and into the next...

* Collect Gems to increase the time available.
* Collect Hearts to replenish health.

Complete each level in the fastest time to secure a spot on the global leaderboard.
Achieve a high Star Rating to boost your score:
  • One Star - for completing the level
  • Two Stars - if you get through without dying
  • Three Stars - if you can complete the level without taking a single hit!


Keyboard Controls
Move with WASD or the Arrow Keys. Pressing up increases the ball's bounce height and down makes it stop bouncing, useful for rolling under low obstacles or staying on moving platforms.
The Spacebar or Left Mouse Button (in addition to either left or right movement) will shoot in that direction.
Escape to Pause, press again to return or use left / right movement for other options.

Gamepad
Left Stick to move left / right, South (A) to bounce higher and Left Trigger to roll. East (B) or Right Trigger to shoot (as above) and Start to pause / return, with DPad for options.

General
Pressing 'T' (keyboard) or Left Shoulder (gamepad) toggles the ball's trail.

Tips:
You can't destroy the traps! They will 'one shot' you, so best just avoid them... Colliding with a Green Meanie will also result in a sudden demise, but you can shoot them. They sometimes drop a collectable on death. Hearts restore some of your health and gems increase the time you have to complete the level. Crates and Barrels often contain goodies as well. Shoot 'em and try your luck.

There is a Compass in the top right. This indicates the direction to the next objective. It shows where it is, but not necessarily how to get there...

Bottom left are your Vitals. The red ring shows health and the white semi circle indicates time remaining. You start with just 90 seconds!
Inside the orb is elapsed time and current Star Rating. Remaining lives are shown to the left of this.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 30 series
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
